languages.text: "Не сравнивай абсолют Лекса с инстинктами ксеносов. Закон Императора столь совершенен, что людям не дано его понять. Но всем дано следовать ему — не важно, добровольно или нет".

traits.locale_text: "Не сравнивай абсолют Лекса с инстинктами ксеносов. Закон Императора столь совершенен, что людям не дано его понять. Но всем дано следовать ему — не важно, добровольно или нет".

languages.text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."
languages.original_text: "Не сравнивай абсолют Лекса с инстинктами ксеносов. Закон Императора столь совершенен, что людям не дано его понять. Но всем дано следовать ему — не важно, добровольно или нет".

traits.locale_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

"Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

"Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

languages.text: 「レックスの絶対性を、異種族どもの本能と比べるな。皇帝陛下の法の完全性は、理解されるためのものではない。だが、従うためのものだ―自らの意思であろうと、強制であろうとな」
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「レックスの絶対性を、異種族どもの本能と比べるな。皇帝陛下の法の完全性は、理解されるためのものではない。だが、従うためのものだ―自らの意思であろうと、強制であろうとな」

languages.text: "Vergleicht das Absolute des Lex nicht mit Xenos-Instinkten. Die Perfektion des Gesetzes des Imperators ist, dass es nicht verstanden werden soll. Es soll aber befolgt werden, ob willentlich oder nicht."
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Vergleicht das Absolute des Lex nicht mit Xenos-Instinkten. Die Perfektion des Gesetzes des Imperators ist, dass es nicht verstanden werden soll. Es soll aber befolgt werden, ob willentlich oder nicht."

languages.text: « Ne comparez pas le caractère absolu de la Lex aux instincts des xénos. La loi de l'Empereur est à ce point parfaite que nous ne sommes pas censés la comprendre. Nous devons simplement la suivre, volontairement ou non. »
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « Ne comparez pas le caractère absolu de la Lex aux instincts des xénos. La loi de l'Empereur est à ce point parfaite que nous ne sommes pas censés la comprendre. Nous devons simplement la suivre, volontairement ou non. »

« Ne comparez pas le caractère absolu de la Lex aux instincts des xénos. La loi de l'Empereur est à ce point parfaite que nous ne sommes pas censés la comprendre. Nous devons simplement la suivre, volontairement ou non. »

languages.text: «No compares la naturaleza absoluta de la Lex con los instintos de los xenos. La perfección de la ley del Emperador es tal que no requiere comprensión, sino obediencia... voluntaria o por la fuerza».
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: «No compares la naturaleza absoluta de la Lex con los instintos de los xenos. La perfección de la ley del Emperador es tal que no requiere comprensión, sino obediencia... voluntaria o por la fuerza».

languages.text: “不要把完美无缺的帝国律法与你们的异形本能相提并论。帝皇的法律是完美的，因此注定无法被凡人所理解。不过，无论凡人愿不愿意，他们都必须遵守。”
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: “不要把完美无缺的帝国律法与你们的异形本能相提并论。帝皇的法律是完美的，因此注定无法被凡人所理解。不过，无论凡人愿不愿意，他们都必须遵守。”

languages.text: "Lex'in mutlaklığı, zenoların içgüdüleriyle mukayese edilemez. İmparator'un Yasası kusursuzdur; idrak değil, biat edilmek içindir. Kanunlara ya güzellikle uyarsın ya da sonuçlarına katlanırsın."
languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Lex'in mutlaklığı, zenoların içgüdüleriyle mukayese edilemez. İmparator'un Yasası kusursuzdur; idrak değil, biat edilmek içindir. Kanunlara ya güzellikle uyarsın ya da sonuçlarına katlanırsın."
"Lex'in mutlaklığı, zenoların içgüdüleriyle mukayese edilemez. İmparator'un kanunları kusursuzdur, idrak değil biat edilmek içindir. Kanunlara ya güzellikle uyarsın ya da sonuçlarına katlanırsın."

languages.original_text: "Do not compare the absolute of the Lex to xenos instincts. The perfection of the Emperor's Law is such that it is not meant to be comprehended. But it is meant to be followed — willingly or otherwise."
